changeSet.author: seyit
changeSet.sql:
create sequence num;;
create table flora ( id bigint not null primary key, num varchar(100), catalog varchar(255), collectedBy varchar(2000), typeTitle varchar(500), familyTitle varchar(500), floraNum varchar(100), collectPlace varchar(2000), collectCoordinate varchar(100), collectAltitude varchar(100), collectDate varchar(100), floraWeight varchar(100), useReason varchar(100), behaviorPercent varchar(100) );;
